internal.content: --- title: Solution configuration description: Configuration for the use case --- Updated 10/26/2020 - Work in progress Environment Preparation and Deployment Demo Scenario This chapter documents the environment pre-requisites to deploy the artifacts supporting the integration of WML with ODM. ## Environment In order to run the use case, you will need to have an OpenShift cluster with the following components installed: - IBM Cloud Pak� for Data 3.0.1 - IBM Cloud Pak� for Automation version 20.0.2 - Operational Decision Manager (ODM) - Business Automation Insights (BAI) ## Deployment
